reviews.review: Portal 3 when
Игра нормальноя . но ОЧЕНЬ НЕ ЛЮБИТ ALT TAB ПОСЛЕ НЕГО МОЖЕТ ВЫЛЕТЕТЬ ВСЯ СИСТЕМА . Вывод стальные нервы - поукупай .

This is definitely one of the best games in Steam. From it's passive-aggressive jokes, to it's compelling puzzles, this is a game you are looking for if you want replayability. I have played it 5+ times through, and still enjoy the gameplay. If you are bored with the story, there is the whole community of map creators for even more playability. I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys passive-aggressive humor, in combination to puzzles that make you think.

+ Hikaye
+ Grafik
+ Puzzel
+ Dahilik
+ İngilizce olan katkısı

+ CO OP olması 
+ daha ne deyim be ''Portal 3'' sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum..

Minha análise de Portal 2: [h1] Positiva [/h1]

Portal 2, é um jogo de estratégias, resolvendo puzzles, e isso vai te deixar muito pensativo e com dor de cabeça, tem cada puzzle, pra você passar que vai deixar vc muito pensativo, "o que é pra fazer nessa porra?!" No início começa a ficar fácil, ai começa a ficar dificil, sei, eu tenho poucas horas de jogo, porque me enjoei de jogar o game. Também, não vai ficar divertido sem o modo cooperativo. O jogo não enjoa se tiver o modo cooperativo, que é foda pra caralho, também é divertido você jogar com seus amiguinhos! Veja a minha avaliação abaixo

Gráficos: 10/10
Jogabilidade: 10/10
Nota: 11/10

E esse foi a minha análise de Portal 2! (Também ficou uma bosta, e também sou ruim de português)

没玩之前同学说是考智商的游戏；玩了之后，每过一关都觉得自己智商200+

[h1]总之强推！！[/h1]
ps.最好要等[u]减价[/u]的时候入，1&2bundle 一共18 [b]Wait it on sale!!![/b]
[spoiler]再ps.被炮台打到也不会再像第一部满地血了真好_(Tзゝ∠)_[/spoiler]
[h1]啊对了还有很重要的一点！玩的时候一定把输入法换回自带的！不能要中文输入法否则会一直卡！[/h1]
可以说这款游戏放到现在也极具新意，玩了后根本停不下来，故事剧情也是和闯关相互交替进行的，结尾也是非常感人，曾经互相厮杀的人类和机器人，最后在经历生死存亡的重重考验后，最后成为了朋友，也是非常有教育意义的，整体玩下来，就是在一种由喜到悲再到喜的过程，玩了这么长时间，没有碰到bug，而且还有联机模式，和朋友相互配合，闯过层层难关，也是非常有意思的，推荐大家去尝试一下

[b][h1]Portal 2[/h1][/b]
[b]Genre:[/b] Puzzle
[b]Developer:[/b] Valve 
[b]Publisher:[/b] Valve	
[b]Release Date:[/b] 19 April 2011

[h1]About the game[/h1]
Portal 2 is a first person puzzle adventure developed and published by Valve. the game is based around portals. after the introduction of the game, you'll receive a portalgun to create your own portals so that you can finish each test chamber.
even though the game doesn't teach you everything. it is easy to find out yourself but can be hard to master. 

The story of the game expands on the one of it's Predecesor ([i]Portal[/i]). you control Chell, a silent female protagonist who is locked up in the Aperture Science Research Facility for the sole purpose of testing. The story of the game is so brilliant because you don't have to have played the original game to understand the story but it can be rewarding if you have.

[h1]Multiplayer[/h1]
In 2012 Valve introduced the Coöperative Testing Initiative. a series of coöperative testing chambers to play with one of your friends. it contains all the mechanics of the base game but can be way harder because you have to really work together to finish them.

The game contains 48 fun and challenging Co-op test divided in 6 courses each introducing a new mechanic.

[h1]Workshop support[/h1]
with the introduction of Steam Workshop support, players can now create and share their own testing chambers as well as play the ones other people have created. so you are basically never finished as there are more test chambers than you will ever be able to play ranging from very easy to extremely hard.

[h1]Verdict[/h1]
This game is the perfect combination of challenging and fun. and the amazing cast of characters and environments only makes it better. even on my third playthrough, the game was still enjoyable and I still discover new easter eggs everytime I play. In my opinion this is one of the best games created by Valve and even one of the best games available on steam. that said, my final verdict for this game would be a solid
[i][h1]9/10[/h1][/i]

So ive played portal 2 before ive played portal one. So this one is the reason why i fell in love all things portal. So what makes this great? With Characters with so much personality and good puzzel to make you really think. Also playing with a friend is so much entertaining specially with you 'accidently' make them fell. mwahahahaha

збс игра

Anyone who hasn't played Portal/2 yet should definitely give it a shot as it is a truly unique experience.

After the introduction to the mechanics in the first, Portal 2 works on expanding the backstory of the setting, with a smoother visual upgrade. This time with two characters to back and forth, the game only manages to get funnier. Like with the first game, the levels sit at easy to challenging, but none are so hard that you rage-quit. The game definitely has replay-value, and also hosts a co-op campaign, making it a great value for money.

Крайне затягивающая головомка от первого лица! Просто умопомрачительный и фееричный сюжет который не оставит вас равнодушным. Множесто скрытых и спрятанных пасхалок и повторяю, УМОПОМРАЧИТЕЛЬНЫЙ СЮЖЕТ! 

Отдельно стоит упамянуть кооперативную игру! Ведь сюжет в ней не менее интересен чем в однопользовательской кампании. А главное уроыни в кооперативном режиме действительно застявят напрячь мозги.
[b]Tek başına oynarken bile zevkli.[/b]
非常棒的游戏！值得购买！
This Game Is Amazing!

Заметно что сюжету уделили намного больше внимания чем в первой части. Повороты событий не возможно предугадать. Иногда становится жутко и страшно, иногда смешно и забавно. 
Так же увеличено число всяких вспомогательных устройств для прохоождения уровней. Хотя уровней мы проходим значительно меняьше. Бо'льшую часть игры мы бегаем по закрытым глазу обычного чеговека рабочим помещениям. 
По мере прохождения не перестаю удивляться, что мы можем делать всего с одной портальной пушкой.
Возможно в начале игры было слишком много подколов со стороны ГЛАДОС. 
но 10/10 она заслуживает

THE best puzzle game, period. I remember watching the TV ad for this back in 2011 and being absolutely mesmerized, I was undoubtedly hooked. 5 years later I finally picked it up and boy did it live up to my expectations. Everything is thought out and designed in spectacular manor. From the voice acting, to the gameplay, to one of the best soundtracks in gaming history. Couple that with the extensive lore and a near-perfect story. It really comes out to one hell of a game. I wouldn't think twice about buying Portal 2, its valves magnum opus. Especially at the dirt cheap price point. In my opinion, everyone should play portal. 5/5, no doubt about it.
